title: Secret Admiration
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Eli-san, thank you very much! Ruby will do my best with the training plan you taught me<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You can ask me anytime for something like this. But, are you fine with my opinion?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Actually, big sis told me to. She said that I should talk with Eli-san about it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Dia did?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>It’s supposed to be a secret, but…. She’s always been a big fan of you, Eli-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eeh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>She really respects you, Eli-san. She said that your performance is really impressive so we must learn from you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>So Dia sees me like that, huh…. But why doesn’t she come together with you? I wanted to practice together with her. I respect her too, so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>She might be embarrassed….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Alright. I guess I’ll have to go myself. Next holiday, I’ll come to Uchiura in secret, so catch Dia for me, okay Ruby♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
